title: Playtomic
description:
Free, real time analytics for Unity3D games!

With Playtomic you can track player data, custom metrics, level metrics, heatmaps, as well as leverage leaderboards, user created levels and content, and store game configuration in our servers where it can be updated at any time.  It's super easy to set up and we're always open to feedback and suggestions on how to make things even better for our Unity developers!

For maximum awesome get a copy of Chris Ellis's Heatmap Emitter which imports Playtomic heatmap data directly into the editor:  http://u3d.as/2sn
changes:
Repackaged it with Unity3d version 3.3 so it shouldn't require anyone to update.

Changed initialise to initialize.
